original:
対象の[Smoke]3につき、マッチ威力 +1(最大2)
自分の[Smoke]3につき、ダメージ量 +10%(最大20%)
[WhenUse] 自分の[Smoke]が10なら、コイン威力 +2
[EndSkill] 自分の[Smoke]を全て消耗
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
対象の[Smoke]3につき、マッチ威力 +1(最大2)
自分の[Smoke]3につき、ダメージ量 +10%(最大20%)
[WhenUse] 自分の[Smoke]が10なら、コイン威力 +2
[EndSkill] 自分の[Smoke]を全て消耗
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
대상의 [Smoke] 3당, 합 위력 +1 (최대 2)
자신의 [Smoke] 3당, 피해량 +10% (최대 20%)
[WhenUse] 자신의 [Smoke]가 10이면, 코인 위력 +2
[EndSkill] 자신의 [Smoke] 전부 소모
EN:
Clash Power +1 for every 3 [Smoke] on the target (max 2)
Deal +10% damage for every 3 [Smoke] on self (max 20%)
[WhenUse] At 10 [Smoke], Coin Power +2
[EndSkill] Consume all [Smoke] on self

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] [Smoke] 3 부여
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Smoke]

original:
[OnSucceedAttack] 対象の[Smoke]3につき、コインを再使用(最大3回発動)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[OnSucceedAttack] 対象の[Smoke]3につき、コインを再使用(最大3回発動)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] 대상의 [Smoke] 3 당, 코인 재사용 (최대 3회 발동)
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Reuse Coin for every 3 [Smoke] on the target (3 times max)

KR:
회피 명령
EN:
Evade Order

original:
[OnSucceedEvade] [Smoke]3を得る、[Smoke]回数が1増加
[OnSucceedEvade] 自分の[Smoke]が10なら、次のターンに[ParryingResultUp]1, [Protection]3を得る(1ターンにつき1回)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[OnSucceedEvade] [Smoke]3を得る、[Smoke]回数が1増加
[OnSucceedEvade] 自分の[Smoke]が10なら、次のターンに[ParryingResultUp]1, [Protection]3を得る(1ターンにつき1回)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:

EN:
[OnSucceedEvade] Gain 3 [Smoke] and +1 [Smoke] Count
[OnSucceedEvade] At 10 [Smoke], gain 1 [ParryingResultUp] and 3 [Protection] next turn (once per turn)

original:

自分の[Smoke]3につき、ダメージ量 +10%

[WhenUse] 自分の[Smoke]が10なら、コイン威力 +1
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
対象の[Smoke]3につき、マッチ威力 +1
自分の[Smoke]3につき、ダメージ量 +10%

context:

자신의 [Smoke] 3당, 피해량 +10%
